patthana1.8:1.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
patthana1.8:1.1_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:2.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagatā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:2.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagatā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:3.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—pītisahagataṁ
patthana1.8:3.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:3.1_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:4.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:4.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:5.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:5.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:6.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—sukhasahagataṁ
patthana1.8:6.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:6.1_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:7.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:8.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—pītisahagatañca
patthana1.8:8.1_1: sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:8.1_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:9.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—pītisahagatañca
patthana1.8:9.1_1: sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagatā dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:9.1_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagatā dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:10.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—pītisahagatañca
patthana1.8:10.1_1: sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:10.1_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:11.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.8:12.1_3: anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye
patthana1.8:12.1_4: jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sabbattha dasa.
patthana1.8:14.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:15.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ
patthana1.8:16.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.8:16.1_1: pītisahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:17.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:18.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ
patthana1.8:19.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.8:19.1_1: sukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:20.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:20.1_2: Ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:20.1_4: Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.8:21.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.8:21.1_1: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.8:22.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.8:22.1_1: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagatā dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:23.1_0: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana1.8:23.1_1: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:24.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā (naadhipatipaṭisandhikkhaṇe paripuṇṇaṁ) …
patthana1.8:25.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— pītisahagate khandhe paṭicca pītisahagatā cetanā.
patthana1.8:26.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— pītisahagate khandhe paṭicca sukhasahagatā cetanā.
patthana1.8:28.1_0: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā …pe….
patthana1.8:29.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā— sukhasahagataṁ kāyaviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:30.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—catuviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana1.8:31.1_0: (Namaggapaccayā nahetupaccayasadisaṁ. Moho natthi. Navippayuttapaccayā paripuṇṇaṁ, arūpapañhameva.)
patthana1.8:32.1_2: napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke dasa,
patthana1.8:34.1_2: napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke navippayutte dasa.
patthana1.8:36.1_3: sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne sabbe dasa,
patthana1.8:36.1_6: vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sabbe dasa.
patthana1.8:39.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:39.1_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:40.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.8:41.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—pītisahagatā
patthana1.8:41.1_1: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:43.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— upekkhāsahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:44.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa …pe…
patthana1.8:44.1_2: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā
patthana1.8:44.1_3: ca hetū sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:45.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ
patthana1.8:45.1_1: datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ pītisahagatena cittena paccavekkhati,
patthana1.8:45.1_4: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ pītisahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:45.1_5: Ariyā pītisahagatena cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.8:45.1_8: Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:45.1_11: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:46.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ
patthana1.8:46.1_1: datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ sukhasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati,
patthana1.8:46.1_4: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ sukhasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:46.1_5: Ariyā sukhasahagatena cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.8:46.1_8: Pītisahagate khandhe sukhasahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:46.1_11: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha sukhasahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:47.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ
patthana1.8:47.1_1: datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati,
patthana1.8:47.1_4: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:47.1_5: Ariyā upekkhāsahagatena cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.8:47.1_8: Pītisahagate khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:47.1_19: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha upekkhāsahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:48.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—pītisahagatena
patthana1.8:48.1_1: cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena
patthana1.8:48.1_5: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:48.1_6: Ariyā pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.8:48.1_9: Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:48.1_10: taṁ ārabbha pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca rāgo uppajjati,
patthana1.8:48.1_12: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:49.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:49.1_3: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—sukhasahagate khandhe ārabbha
patthana1.8:49.1_4: pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:50.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— upekkhāsahagatena cittena
patthana1.8:50.1_1: dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati,
patthana1.8:50.1_4: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṁ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:50.1_5: Ariyā upekkhāsahagatena cittena upekkhāsahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.8:50.1_8: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:50.1_21: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe ārabbha upekkhāsahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:51.1_2: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—upekkhāsahagatena cittena
patthana1.8:51.1_3: dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati,
patthana1.8:51.1_6: taṁ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:51.1_7: Ariyā pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena upekkhāsahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.8:51.1_10: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:51.1_11: taṁ ārabbha pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca rāgo uppajjati,
patthana1.8:51.1_13: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:52.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa …pe…
patthana1.8:52.1_2: upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena dānaṁ
patthana1.8:52.1_4: pītisahagate ca sukhasahagate ca khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.8:52.1_10: Pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa,
patthana1.8:52.1_15: Pītisahagate ca sukhasahagate ca khandhe ārabbha upekkhāsahagatā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana1.8:53.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:54.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:54.1_2: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—pītisahagatena cittena dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā pītisahagatena cittena taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati,
patthana1.8:54.1_5: phalā vuṭṭhahitvā pītisahagatena cittena taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:54.1_6: Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena cittena garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.8:54.1_7: taṁ garuṁ katvā pītisahagato rāgo uppajjati,
patthana1.8:55.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:56.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:57.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:57.1_3: **Sahajātādhipati**—pītisahagatādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:58.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:59.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:60.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇādhipati**(Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.8:61.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:61.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—sukhasahagatādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:62.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:63.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇādhipati**(Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.8:64.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇādhipati**(Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.8:65.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇādhipati**(Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.8:66.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.8:66.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.8:110.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā—pītisahagatā cetanā vipākānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:111.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:111.1_1: Nānākkhaṇikā—pītisahagatā cetanā vipākānaṁ upekkhāsahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:112.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana1.8:112.1_2: **Sahajātā**—pītisahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:112.1_4: Nānākkhaṇikā— pītisahagatā cetanā vipākānaṁ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:113.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa. (Cattāripi gaṇanāni passitvā kātabbāni.)
patthana1.8:114.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana1.8:115.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:116.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:117.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:118.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa.
patthana1.8:119.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo— pītisahagato vipāko eko khandho
patthana1.8:119.1_3: paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.8:120.1_0: (Yathā paṭiccavāre hetupaccaye evaṁ vitthāretabbā dasa pañhā.)
patthana1.8:121.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:122.1_12: āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte atthiyā dasa,
patthana1.8:125.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:126.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:127.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:128.1_0: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:129.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:130.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:131.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:132.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:133.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:134.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:135.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:136.1_0: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:137.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:138.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:139.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:140.1_0: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:141.1_1: naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye naupanissaye napurejāte
patthana1.8:141.1_2: napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā
patthana1.8:144.1_2: naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye
patthana1.8:144.1_3: najhāne namagge navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate sabbattha dasa.
